name: Romance Resort Demo
description:
Warning: Contains swearing and suggestive themes (rated +13)

After being single for a long time and very frustrated by the limited (sexy) choices in the Otome games you play you turn in frustration to the internet. There you find the Romance Resort, which promises hot guys galore according to the many satisfied customers.  And so in your desperate need you book the trip. Soon after arrival you are not disappointed as you meet three very attractive men and one very weird... Juan. You have only three days at this exclusive resort, will your find your desired romance, or return empty handed? 

*HINT: click on the faces in the title screen to hear the voices!

-This Game is a Demo version: the story has been made shorter for the sake of meeting the deadline. Not all the voice effects have been added either. For the Full all text will be voiced over (for the guys). Feedback always welcome!
